text: ie dabhayeo seonjijadeul-i mal hayeossdeola ulineun neohuiwa gat-eun in gan-e bulgwahana hananimkkeseoneun geubun ui jong jung-eseo geubun-ui tteusdaelo eunhye leul bepusinila ulineun hananim-ui heolag-eobs-i neohuiege yejeung-eul ileuge hal su eobsnani geuleomeulo modeun midneun sindodeul-eun hananimkke uitaghala
